name: CODE_EXECUTOR__UPLOAD_FILES
description: Uploads one or more files into the sandboxed execution environment. This tool should be used before 'execute_code' if the script needs to read from files.

artifact_ids.description: A list of Artifact IDs representing the files to be uploaded into the session's virtual filesystem.

name: CODE_EXECUTOR__EXECUTE_CODE
description: Executes a snippet of Python code within a persistent, sandboxed session. The session maintains its state and filesystem between calls.

code.description: A string containing the Python code to be executed.

name: CODE_EXECUTOR__DOWNLOAD_FILES
description: Downloads one or more files from the execution environment after a script has run. This tool should be used to retrieve any files generated by 'execute_code'.

filenames.description: A list of filenames to download from the session's virtual filesystem. These files should have been created by a previous 'execute_code' call.
